ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are thankful to the Central Department of Botany, Tribhuvan University, Nepal, for authentication of the collected plant samples, Annapurna Research Center for the cytotoxicity test, Department of Neurosurgery of Kagoshima University, Japan, for providing them with U251 cell lines, Shikhar Biotech Pvt. Ltd., Nepal, for providing them with HeLa cell lines, and the University Grants Commission, Nepal, for their financial support for this research. Professor Acram Taji AM, Australia, critically reviewed the manuscript and provided pertinent comments.
